Translations.Text: Ili trov gxi strang ke warner el them ven them! disbelievers dir This est really strang
Post ni mort igx polv; this est impossible
Ni est fully aware da anyone de them gets konsum ter; ni hav accurate record
Ili rejected truth when gxi ven them; ili utterly konfuz
Ili ne rigard cxiel super them kiel ni konstru gxi ornam gxi flaw
Ni kre ter scattered gxi mont kresk gxi all kinds da bel plant
This est enlightenment reminder cxiu pi worshiper
Ni send cxiel ben akv kresk gxi gxarden grajn rikolt
Provisions popol. Ni revive gxi dead land; vi similarly resurrected
Disbelieving them est popol Noah dwellers Russ Thamoud
dwellers lign popol Tubba. All da them disbelieved messengers consequently My retribution befell them
Ni tro sxargx 1 creation? this why ili est dub resurrection
